ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is a cause of great distress to those who are kafir.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is surely the nemesis of unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and surely it will be a cause of regret for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and (on the Day of Judgment) this will be a great source of regret for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed it is a despair for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed it will be an anguish for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely it is a great grief to the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely it is a sorrow to the unbelievers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is indeed an anguish for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it will be a source of bitter regret for those who deny the truth --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it shall be an occasion of anguish Unto the infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And indeed it will be a [matter of] regret for the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But truly (Revelation) is a cause of sorrow for the Unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed it (this Quran) will be an anguish for the disbelievers (on the Day of Resurrection).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, it is a sorrow to the unbelievers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is surely a source of grief for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:50] And assuredly it, that is, the Qur’ān, is a [cause of] anguish for the disbelievers, when they see the reward of those who affirmed its truth and the punishment of those who denied it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is indeed an anguish) a remorse (for the disbelievers) on the Day of Judgement.
